A children's book that tells the story of a cat who discovers its wings and goes on a magical adventure to explore the world around it.
A short film that follows a cat as it navigates its way through a maze of obstacles, using its wings to overcome challenges and reach its goal.
A series of illustrations that depict a cat with wings, exploring different environments and meeting new creatures along the way.
A poem that highlights the idea that even seemingly impossible challenges can be overcome with determination and perseverance.
A video game that puts players in the role of a cat with wings, challenging them to navigate through different levels and overcome obstacles to reach the end.
